markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Alkenstar Sojourner](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=281)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

You came to Alkenstar because you heard they had guns, but you stayed because of the atmosphere. Or the guns. Either way, journalism and scientific curiosity opened the door to a life of adventure. Now you continue to adventure in the Alkenstar area, using your skills to deal with whatever situations present themselves.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) skill, and the [Engineering Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Streetwise](/Feats.aspx?ID=846) skill feat.
name: Alkenstar Sojourner

text: Alkenstar Sojourner Source Guns & Gears pg. 124 2.0 You came to Alkenstar because you heard they had guns, but you stayed because of the atmosphere. Or the guns. Either way, journalism and scientific curiosity opened the door to a life of adventure. Now you continue to adventure in the Alkenstar area, using your skills to deal with whatever situations present themselves. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Society skill, and the Engineering Lore skill. You gain the Streetwise skill feat.
